payment

Class PaymentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • payment.PaymentController

  • public class PaymentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Payment Controller Basically make use of the Payment entity class and manipulate the data Hence, it role is to include of logics that involves the Payment entity class
    Since:
    13/4/2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Low Shu En

      private static java.util.List<Payment> paymentList
      Stores the list of all payment objects created by calling the retrievePaymentList() method

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int computeNoOfWeekends(java.util.Date checkInDate, java.util.Date checkOutDate)
      This method calculate the days of stay (weekends) based on check in and check out date
      static double computeRoomChargesByRoomTypes(java.lang.String roomType, int weekdays, int weekends)
      This method basically compute the room charges based on room type, weekdays and weekends
      static Payment getPaymentByPaymentId(java.lang.String paymentId)
      Search by payment id only returns one payment object as payment id is a primary key

      This method prints the bill invoice for that payment object
      static boolean removePayment(Payment payment)
      This method basically remove that particular payment that is being passed into the parameter from the payment list and data file
      static java.util.List<Payment> retrievePaymentList() 
      static boolean updatePaymentList(Payment payment)
      This method basically create or update the particular Payment object that is being passed into the parameter It checks if the payment object exist or not, if exists, it is being override (updated) else it creates the payment into the data file payment list is being updated accordingly

      • computeNoOfWeekends

        public static int computeNoOfWeekends(java.util.Date checkInDate,
                                      java.util.Date checkOutDate)
        This method calculate the days of stay (weekends) based on check in and check out date
        Parameters:
        checkInDate - Check-in date
        checkOutDate - Check-out date
        Returns:
        number of weekends

      • computeRoomChargesByRoomTypes

        public static double computeRoomChargesByRoomTypes(java.lang.String roomType,
                                                   int weekdays,
                                                   int weekends)
        This method basically compute the room charges based on room type, weekdays and weekends
        Parameters:
        roomType - Room Type
        weekdays - No. of weekdays
        weekends - No. of weekends
        Returns:
        room charges

      • getPaymentByPaymentId

        public static Payment getPaymentByPaymentId(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Search by payment id only returns one payment object as payment id is a primary key
        Parameters:
        paymentId - PaymentID
        Returns:
        the payment object that contains the payment id that is being passed in else @return null if no such payment id exist

      • printBillInvoice

        public static void printBillInvoice(Payment payment)
        This method prints the bill invoice for that payment object
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object

      • removePayment

        public static boolean removePayment(Payment payment)
        This method basically remove that particular payment that is being passed into the parameter from the payment list and data file
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object to be removed
        Returns:
        true if payment is removed successfully else @return false if the removal is unsuccessful

      • retrievePaymentList

        public static java.util.List<Payment> retrievePaymentList()
        Returns:
        the list containing all guest objects

      • updatePaymentList

        public static boolean updatePaymentList(Payment payment)
        This method basically create or update the particular Payment object that is being passed into the parameter It checks if the payment object exist or not, if exists, it is being override (updated) else it creates the payment into the data file payment list is being updated accordingly
        Parameters:
        payment - Payment object to be created or updated
        Returns:
        true if payment is updated / created successfully else @return false if updating or creating of payment is unsuccessful
